page.title: 19WITHINGTON SERVICES.
page.content: {Medical:}Two doctors hold weekly surgeries.One in a private house the other in the village hall.There is no longer a resident District Nurse and the nurses cottage has recently been sold. {Postal:}One delivery and 2 collections each week day. There is one delivery and one collection on the weekend.The village has a seperate post office which will close later in the year and become a part of the village store. {Power:}All houses have a mains electricity supply but there is no mains gas supply. {Sewage:}Most houses have septic tanks. {Refuse:}A weekly collection. {Shops:}The village has a general store which is open daily.A number of mobile tradesmen make weekly visits.They include a butcher two fishmongers and a hardware dealer.
